dialog.npc.banker.name: Caroline
What do you need from me?
Don't expect me to lend you any money for your farm.
I'm already doing so much to support this settlement.
Sorry, I don't loan money to farmers.
One bad season and they come to you crying about their interest rates.
I have things I need to be doing right now.
I don't have time to chat with you.
Don't you have some work you should be doing?
I hope you're not slacking off when so many people here are depending on you.
Ugh, do you need something from me?
Developing towns are such a drag.
No culture, just labor and filth.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship0.10: My time is worth more than yours, don't waste it.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship0.11: You're wasting both of our time right now.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship0.12: I'm perfectly capable of keeping busy without your interruptions.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship0.13: It's rude to interrupt someone while they're working.
Not that I would expect a simple farmer like you to have manners.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship0.14: Don't tell me you came over here without cleaning yourself up...
I suppose there's worse places to live than here.
Why do you insist on the chit-chat.
I hope it's clear that I have things to do.
Do I seem like the type of person you can just bug every day?
There's more pleasant smelling fertilizers out there you know.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship1.10: I think I've said enough to you.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship1.12: The most irritating people are the one who can't tell they're not wanted.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship1.13: Either buy something or walk away.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship1.15: There's no need to chat right now.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship1.16: I have far too much to do.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship1.17: I don't want to chat with you.
Keep it professional, if you are even capable of that.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship1.18: You aren't a very good listener.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship1.19: You're the only person here that doesn't listen to the things I say.
There's so many natural resources to exploit around here.
And yet, all you do is talk.
Try to diversify your income streams.
I don't want this town relying on a single point of failure.
What calls you to keep speaking to me so often.
I recognized that scent from across the valley.
I believe in talking behind peoples' backs.
That way, they hear what I have to say more than once.
Are you the one who's been buying all that animal feed?
I've had to order more stock twice this season.
You should be making more money right now than you are.
Please stop slacking and try harder.
A weaker person would have given up talking to me by now.
Do you need something from me or are you just wasting my time.
Some of your recent purcahses have...
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship2.10: I've seen many small settlements just like this one fail time and time again.
Don't add another to the list.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship2.11: The local economy seems strong lately.
I must be doing something right.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship2.12: Have you ever thought about how shop keepers magically have all the things you need?
You seem like the type to be oblivious to matters like these.
Everything here happens because I allow it to. Remember that.
Stop slacking off again, I know what you're up to.
I'm still not used to the sounds of the wilderness.
I would not recommend testing this boundary.
I once knew a person that constantly tried to defraud the Sunlit Valley Hospital...
Terrible person all around, never lent them a dollar.
You're keeping me from some important things right now, make it quick.
Need I remind you that my time is worth more than yours.
I hate all these bugs, someone should really do something about them.
I don't appreciate all your attempts to get closer to me.
Once my work here is done I'll be installing a proxy and moving on to better things.
Do you think talking to me every day and showering me with phoned-in gifts will make me like you?
At least make the gifts good.
I don't have time to chat with you today.
How are things on the farm?
There's that smell again. Do you smell that too?
Have you made a Smart Shipping Bin yet?
It should cut down on your manual labor by a small amount.
You need all the help you can get.
You're putting in so much effort into getting to know me.
Please direct that energy into more profitable work.
What? You should know not to interrupt me like that by now.
I just don't have the time for idle chit-chat today.
I hope things are going well on your farm.
Do you continually pester everyone like this?
What can I help you with today?
The town is thriving, keep it up.
Ugh, the warehouse has been backed up for two seasons now.
I can't let this impact production here.
I'm having trouble keeping everything in stock lately.
You should have more than enough money at this point to enjoy a pig race every now and again.
Just so you know, the town went slightly past budget last season.
I was able to cover the difference this time.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship5.10: I'm tired of all these pedestrian meals.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship5.11: I don't have much time to chat, let's talk later
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship5.12: Some people are impressed by your progress here and will tell you as much.
Don't let it get to your head.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship5.13: Noticed a few shops were running low on stock latey.
You must really be expanding production, impressive.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship5.14: I could use a nice bottle of Cristel right now.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship5.15: You shouldn't be relaxing, you have things to do.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship5.16: You haven't disappointed me yet, but that can always change.
dialog.npc.banker.chatter_friendship5.17: The economic stability of this town depends on you.
dialog.npc.banker.intro.0.line_0: My name is Caroline, and I am the one who's been financing this settlement since before you arrived.
dialog.npc.banker.intro.0.line_1: You've been carelessly buying up everyone's stock, and I need to keep a closer watch of things here.
dialog.npc.banker.intro.0.line_2: I have some things for sale that will help you manage your money better.
dialog.npc.banker.intro.0.line_3: Now, please leave me be while I tidy up this dump. I will contact you if I need anything.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_loved.0.line_0: I didn't know you were capable of having taste.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_loved.1.line_0: Where did you manage to find something like this?
dialog.npc.banker.gift_loved.2.line_0: Maybe it's not so bad around here.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_loved.3.line_0: My horse would love something like this.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_loved.4.line_0: Who told you I like this? You're a snake.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_loved.7.line_0: Flattery will get you everywhere with me!
dialog.npc.banker.gift_loved.8.line_0: Is this from your farm? I hope you're selling more of these.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_liked.0.line_0: I already have a few of these, I suppose it saves me a trip to the store.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_liked.1.line_0: This barely changes how I think of you.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_liked.2.line_0: I know someone who would appreciate this.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_liked.3.line_0: Finally someone with some manners around here.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_liked.5.line_0: Hmmm I can use this I think
dialog.npc.banker.gift_liked.7.line_0: It's about time you did something nice for me.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_neutral.0.line_0: Why are you giving this to me...
dialog.npc.banker.gift_neutral.2.line_0: Do you think I'm poor or something?
dialog.npc.banker.gift_neutral.4.line_0: Are you even trying to get me to like you?
dialog.npc.banker.gift_neutral.7.line_0: You waste my time with these trinkets.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_disliked.1.line_0: Of course someone like you would get me this
dialog.npc.banker.gift_disliked.8.line_0: Tasteless, but I don't know what I was expecting from you.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_disliked.11.line_: You waste my time with these awful paperweights.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_hated.0.line_0: Get out of my face with that.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_hated.1.line_0: Why did I even come to this backwater town.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_hated.2.line_0: Keep this up and you won't have a bank around soon.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_hated.4.line_0: I didn't know you think as little of me as I do you.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_hated.8.line_0: Apologize to your parents for becoming a person that does things like this.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_hated.14.line_0: If this is how you run this place I'm wasting my time here.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_hated.15.line_0: Leave me out of your pathetic jokes.
dialog.npc.blacksmith.name: Aiden
dialog.npc.blacksmith.chatter_friendship: Hello! I can smith for you or whatever ehe
dialog.npc.blacksmith.intro.0.line_0: My name is Aiden! This villager is currently being written.
dialog.npc.blacksmith.intro.0.line_1: I couldn't get all the writing done in time for the playtest!
dialog.npc.blacksmith.gift_liked.0.line_: I love a little treat like this
dialog.npc.blacksmith.gift_disliked.1.li: Why did you think I would like this?
dialog.npc.carpenter.name: Ace
dialog.npc.carpenter.chatter_friendship0: My dialogs are a work in progress.
dialog.npc.carpenter.intro.0.line_0: Hey stranger, my name is Ace. I'm here to help you build the village you're starting in Sunlit Valley.
dialog.npc.carpenter.intro.0.line_1: If you're looking to invite more villagers, come talk to me and I can help you build homes for them.
dialog.npc.carpenter.intro.0.line_2: If you'd prefer to do the building yourself, just let me know and I can sell any building supplies you'll need.
dialog.npc.carpenter.intro.0.line_3: That's all I have for now, you really have your work cut out for you here. Come see me if you need anything!
dialog.npc.carpenter.intro.0.line_4: My dialogs are a work in progress. Thanks for playtesting the pack!
dialog.npc.carpenter.gift_liked.0.line_0: I love a little treat like this
dialog.npc.carpenter.gift_disliked.1.lin: Why did you think I would like this?
dialog.npc.fisher.name: Haruna
How I wish there were a shell I could be listening to right now.
The waves crash against the shore
I wonder who is writing all these messages in bottles.
I hope they don't mind my curiosity.
Where I come from, we use a lot more Neptunium.
Always refreshing to hear from you.
dialog.npc.fisher.intro.0.line_0: Hey stranger, my name is Haruna. I like fish! Tell Frog about it!
dialog.npc.fisher.intro.0.line_1: This villager is currently being written.
dialog.npc.fisher.intro.0.line_2: I couldn't get all the writing done in time for the playtest!
dialog.npc.fisher.gift_liked.0.line_0: I love a little treat like this
dialog.npc.fisher.gift_disliked.1.line_0: Why did you think I would like this?
dialog.npc.market.name: Leon
What can I help you with?
Oh? You're telling me you need more seeds?
I can't imagine wanting to be out in the fields all day.
I'm going to miss going to the cinema every week.
I can't imagine Ace has the plans drawn up for one at the moment.
You look exhuasted, starting a farm must be taking it out of you.
I'm not used to this much solitude.
It'd be nice if it wasn't so boring...
Another quiet day in the valley.
It's deathly quiet out here in the wilderness.
Going to take me some time to get used to.
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship0.10: You know, the less planting you do the less you have to come here.
Just slow down a little, the money can always wait.
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship0.11: Ace is starting to annoy me with all that hammering.
All this open area, the sound travels so far.
No need to look around for anything, I've learned where everything is now.
Remind me, where does your name come from?
Every name has a story, even if you're not aware of it.
When do you get done with working? Do you ever really finish a work day?
If you need anything specific, let me know.
He's so nice to me... I wonder what he wants from me.
Got any stories from your adventures?
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship1.10: People don't really like to cook around here.
You'd make more money selling premade meals than just selling crops.
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship1.11: Why are you even doing all this farming?
It's not like there's anything to buy out here
Can yopu tell Caroline I've been very professional with you?
She doesn't like when I get casual and I really can't be bothered.
Can you hurry up and buy something, I'm really tired right now.
I'm running low on stock this week so go easy on me.
Why does a town this small even need a market. If you ask me, everyone should just barter for food.
Read any classics lately? Or are you still running around from dusk till dawn every day.
Ugh, Caroline's workers are late again today...
She gets mad when they catch me napping
I don't really know much about farming.
The Farmer's Almanac is such a dry read, I haven't bothered to look at it.
I don't care much for the natural beauty of the countryside.
The growth of this town is much more inspiring to me
Why isn't a cutting board just made with wood?
I need to speak with Ace, that doesn't make any sense.
Caroline complained to me the other day about my markup...
Getting books shipped out here isn't cheap, I need that money!
Hey there, what do you need
How can I help you today?
Ugh, Haruna's been stinking up the market lately with her fish...
I could go for some caviar right now...
Is it socially acceptable to eat dinner yet?
Why do you like gardenining so much? Isn't it a little tedious?
Have you met any Ribbits yet? They fascinate me...
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship3.11: The night is so beautiful and harsh out here.
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship3.12: She's not an easy person to talk to, but she's very well connected.
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship3.13: If everything is permitted, why does Caroline bother me so?
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship3.14: Can't wait to get my package. What's taking them so long?
Maybe I should talk to Caroline... Just to check.
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship3.15: Have you spoke to Caroline today?
Did she say anything about my behavior? I really hope not.
I can keep you stocked with bottles if you ever want to get into wine making.
Has Caroline said anything about me to you?
Just curious, I don't think it matters either way.
I wonder what Maria's up to today...
Finally, someone to talk to. It's been so quiet today.
Caroline hasn't been around in a while...
I hope that means I'm doing alright here.
Have you ever been to emporio? Or did you not get out much back then
I miss all my old friends, have they moved on by now?
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship4.10: When it rains I feel this sense of dread, as if it's washing away my protective coating.
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship4.11: I've been missing the comforts of living in a big city.
Everything is so slow around here! I don't have the patience for it.
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship4.12: I've been dying to talk to someone lately.
You'd think people would be coming by here more often...
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship4.13: Has Haruna taken a trip to the Ocean recently?
I gave her some film for the beach to take photos but I'm guessing she forgot about it.
I've been reading about the arcane magic of the Skull Cavern.
Have you had a visit yet?
Do you think Caroline ever gets along with anyone?
I wonder if she has a soft side...
I'm kinda over this whole groceries thing.
Is my only task in this short life to sort products?
I could use a cold glass of wine right about now.
Have you had the time to go out exploring yet?
I'm sure there's some tasty things out there I haven't tried.
The best thing about living out here is the freshness of everything
I never realized blueberries had such strong flavor!
I wonder, are Magic Shears ethical?
I'm sure if they weren't Maria wouldn't sell them...
I'd much rather you exploit nature than other people.
Nature always gets its revenge, while the weak have no advocates.
Caroline visited me the other day! She seemed happy with our sales this season.
Please dont let me dissapoint her!
Caroline has really relaxed lately, have you been sweet talking her?
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship5.10: Were you ever much of a reader before moving here
Literature can be inspiring, it's the frontier of the mind after all.
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship5.11: Have you started making wine yet?
I could use some of that about now...
dialog.npc.market.chatter_friendship5.12: Found any interesting wild crops lately?
I could use something fun to eat.
dialog.npc.market.intro.0.line_0: Hey @i, I'm Leon. I was sent here to manage the local farmer's market.
dialog.npc.market.intro.0.line_1: I'll be making sure you have seeds and some basic farming supplies.
dialog.npc.market.intro.0.line_2: In return some of your produce will be sent here for the other villagers.
dialog.npc.market.intro.0.line_3: Please don't be like all the other farmers that wake up at 6am...
dialog.npc.market.gift_loved.1.line_0: This is mesmerizing. I'll cherish it forever.
dialog.npc.market.gift_loved.2.line_0: What a gift. To know me like this is the mark of a true friend.
dialog.npc.market.gift_loved.3.line_0: Nobody around here would know I like this. Am I really that fascinating to you?
dialog.npc.market.gift_loved.4.line_0: To love someone means to see them as Selene intended them.
dialog.npc.market.gift_loved.5.line_0: This is a fine gift from a finer person!
dialog.npc.market.gift_loved.6.line_0: Aesthetically perfect. A work of art.
dialog.npc.market.gift_loved.7.line_0: I can't stop looking at it...
dialog.npc.market.gift_loved.7.line_1: How on earth did you get your hands on this...
dialog.npc.market.gift_loved.8.line_0: It is the ultimate respect to recieve a masterwork from someone at the height of their craft.
dialog.npc.market.gift_liked.0.line_0: It's always pleasent to recieve a gift like this.
dialog.npc.market.gift_liked.1.line_0: Nothing is easier than flattery, not that I mind!
dialog.npc.market.gift_liked.2.line_0: It's much better to do good in a way that...
dialog.npc.market.gift_liked.2.line_1: No that's not right. I like this way more.
dialog.npc.market.gift_liked.3.line_0: You're very appreciated, I hope you know.
dialog.npc.market.gift_liked.4.line_0: The margins on seeds aren't great, little luxuries like this go a long way!
dialog.npc.market.gift_liked.6.line_0: Thank you, I really needed the pick-me-up!
dialog.npc.market.gift_liked.7.line_0: It's been so slow today, finally something nice happened!
dialog.npc.market.gift_neutral.3.line_0: Are you handing these out to everyone?
dialog.npc.market.gift_neutral.4.line_0: It looks high quality but it's not really to my taste.
dialog.npc.market.gift_neutral.5.line_0: In a way, something this ugly has a certain beauty to it! Exciting!
dialog.npc.market.gift_neutral.6.line_0: I do love a gift! Even if its not quite one I want!
dialog.npc.market.gift_neutral.7.line_0: I'm not really sure how to react to this but thank you for the kindness.
dialog.npc.market.gift_neutral.8.line_0: I have plenty random objects for still life at my shop, but thank you!
dialog.npc.market.gift_neutral.9.line_0: Eventually if you keep giving me things you'll find one I actually like!
dialog.npc.market.gift_neutral.10.line_1: Life is lived in the details, and you need to pay more attention!
dialog.npc.market.gift_neutral.13.line_0: You could have put a little more thought into this.
dialog.npc.market.gift_neutral.14.line_0: I don't hate this for some reasonn.
dialog.npc.market.gift_neutral.15.line_0: Are you even listening to me when I speak to you?
dialog.npc.market.gift_neutral.16.line_0: Someone around here will definitely like this, I'm sure.
dialog.npc.market.gift_disliked.0.line_0: Ahhh I didn't know you were actually an ascetic!
dialog.npc.market.gift_disliked.0.line_1: I thought that was just your look...
dialog.npc.market.gift_disliked.1.line_0: I guess someone who spends so much time digging in the dirt doesn't have time to enjoy the finer things.
dialog.npc.market.gift_disliked.2.line_0: Ahhh I really hope you tried your best.
dialog.npc.market.gift_disliked.4.line_0: I don't really want that. Or need it.
dialog.npc.market.gift_disliked.5.line_0: You can be sincere and still be...
dialog.npc.market.gift_disliked.6.line_0: Let's be real I'm just gonna toss this when you walk away.
dialog.npc.market.gift_disliked.7.line_0: Oh! I'm actually really busy right now.
dialog.npc.market.gift_disliked.7.line_1: Some seeds ran away, I really need to catch them?
dialog.npc.market.gift_disliked.8.line_0: Be real with me are you just pulling random stuff from your pocket to give to me?
dialog.npc.market.gift_disliked.9.line_0: Woah! I don't really want this!
dialog.npc.market.gift_disliked.10.line_: I don't like things like this.
dialog.npc.market.gift_hated.3.line_0: A beast can never be as cruel as a human being, so artistically, so picturesquely cruel.
dialog.npc.market.gift_hated.4.line_0: I hope you aren't this inept at farming.
dialog.npc.market.gift_hated.5.line_0: When you look in the mirror at night, think of all that is wasted on you.
dialog.npc.market.gift_hated.6.line_0: You are senseless and I don't enjoy you.
dialog.npc.market.gift_hated.7.line_0: What kind of person do you take me for?
dialog.npc.market.gift_hated.8.line_0: It takes something more than intelligence to act intelligently.
dialog.npc.market.gift_hated.9.line_0: I deserve better than to be treated like this.
dialog.npc.market.gift_hated.12.line_0: You are a child, get away from me.
dialog.npc.shepherd.name: Maria
Hello there, need anything?
I'm not used to being out in the wild like this.
It's exciting to see all the wildlife!
How's your farm going?
Have you gotten started with some animals yet?
It's eerie here at night, I'm not used to this must open air.
Do you need something?
Need to pick something up?
The valley is full of wild slimes...
They always catch me off gaurd and pop out of nowhere.
Have you seen Ace around?
What can I do for you today?
Hello @i.
I could use a warm cup of coffee right now...
I'm often skeptical of new farmers are see try to take on ranching.
Some of them have a rotten soul unfit to care for them.
I'm not sure about Leon...
I've never met someone so distant.
Always curious about where these new farmers will end up.
Not everyone's cut out for the hard life of labor.
Everyone here is so friendly, it kinda weirds me out.
No not like that! I'm just not used to it!
I saw some wild sheep roaming around the other day.
They look like they could use a warm barn...
No need to stop around so often
I'm more than capable of handling myself out here.
When you choose a name for your animals, it creates a special bond between you and them.
Make sure you name them something that fits their personality!
How are things on your farm?
Everything is so calm and simple around here...
I'm excited to see how things change over time.
Ace gave me some Salmonberries to munch on today!
No wonder I see squirrels digging around for them all the time.
Feel free to stop by if you have any questions about animals.
Do you want something?
How are you today?
Hey @i, what can I do for you?
Everybody lies, but animals will always tell you the truth.
Except racoons, those always try and trick you!
How is Aiden so cheerful standing in that heat all day?
Why did Leon even move out here?
I've never met someone that hates nature more.
I miss the stray cats of the city I grew up in...
Stray sheep are a different kind of nice though!
All these new people in town...
Moving to a new town sure is rough.
I've seen some nasty farmers out there that treat their animals cruelly.
Giant holding penns stuffed to the brim... Makes me sick...
I'm glad you're not like that!
Running low on animal feed?
Or are you here to adopt!
I've been loving seeing all the wild animals run around freely lately.
There's something about the air here that's so freeing.
I hope you're feeding your animals every day.
You'd be grumpy to if you had to skip a meal!
You should see if you can make a Catching Net!
There's so many wonderful butterflies around the valley.
I don't have the heart to garden, all my plants always end up over-watered...
I love the feeling of weaving on a Canvas Loom.
There's nothing quite like it.
Leon was so sour today when I went to get groceries.
People can be so mean when they're tired.
People's hearts are often unveiled with their treatment of animals.
Some people can be so disappointing in life.
Ahh but nobody here is like that! Probably...
Grains like Wheat and Corn can be made into Animal Feed.
I'm sure your animals will appreciate fresher food than what I've got!
Need more feed?
Have you considered ranching pigs?
Truffles are great for making donuts!
Have you talked to Aiden recently?
I really need that order of pails...
Animals have no concept of the evils we are capable of.
It's our job to make sure they never find out.
You can tell a lot about a person by the way they approach a scared animal.
I was reading about Minisheep today in the farmer's almanac.
...So fluffy...
Caroline is a sucker for goat cheese.
Don't mention I said that! I want to know more secrets...
Leon has sewing supplies stocked at the market
Let me know if you need lessons!
Caroline has some expensive taste
Most people don't have an eye for proper merino wool.
Your hands are so calloused!
Let me take a look later, I have a serum made from sheeps milk that will help.
Do you ever think about what our animals dream about?
Someone like you could really use some pets.
I bet it gets lonely over where you are.
I once knew a person that constantly tried to defraud the Sunlit Valley Hospital...
Terrible person all around, never lent them a dollar.
Originally I thought Leon disliked me in particular.
Turns out they're just like that.
There's nothing as sweet as the love of an animal.
Hey @i, what are you up to today?
How's your ranch going today?
You sure like spending time with me.
Or maybe you have some sort of ulterior motive...
You really have no rythm when talking to me.
I never know when to expect you.
I wonder if building out this town effects your ego in any way.
People here will always keep you humble I bet!
Caroline can be so mean!
It's one of the more frustrating things of living here.
There's so much to industrial farming that I dislike.
I understand the realities of keeping society going...
Just don't mistreat animals, I'll know.
There's a myth around farmers that having too many animals will incur the wrath of Selene.
She's so real...
Have you heard about goobers?
I've heard they're native place called the Skull Cavern, wherever that is.
Ace was telling me about mossberries the other day.
I bet they'd make a great jam.
People around here will just come up to me and tell me their secrets.
I guess I look trusting to them?
I've been knitting some sweaters for the harsh winters around here.
Not that you need one for all that running around you do every day!
Leon let me sample some of your animal products the other day.
Everything was so fresh and full of flavor!
Leon sure likes talking about Caroline.
I wonder what that's about...
People sometimes think that I don't like people just because I have a love of animals.
I'm glad you're not one of them
Ahh! I was looking for you @i.
What's on your schedule @i?
What can I do for you?
Some people think they can win me over with gifts and small talk.
That's not a real connection, and you know that.
You've really got an eye for getting to know people.
You're very easy to talk to so it makes sense.
The way a shima enaga tilts its tiny head is a wonder of the world.
Truly a snow fairy!
What a calm day today...
What would you like?
People think pigs are monsters for what people force them to eat.
Animals teach us so much about humanity.
Ace wants to see you about something.
I wonder what you to talk about when nobody's looking.
I knew I'd see you today, I stocked some extra feed ahead of time!
Caroline isn't one of those people that's a sweetheart once you get to know them.
Usually I'm right about these things.
Your ambitions are so frightening to me...
I hope pulling up the roots of this valley is worth whatever you're trying to accomplish.
There's something so nice about the way an animal looks at you with loving eyes.
Nothing quite like it.
dialog.npc.shepherd.intro.0.line_0: Hello, my name is Maria. I'll be here to get you started ranching on your farm.
dialog.npc.shepherd.intro.0.line_1: Raising animals take lots of time, energy and care.
dialog.npc.shepherd.intro.0.line_2: In the end seeing the look on a happy animal's face is well worth it!
dialog.npc.shepherd.intro.0.line_3: If you need any supplies just let me know.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_loved.0.line_0: This makes me feel very at home.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_loved.1.line_0: You're so sweet to me, this is one of my favorites!
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_loved.2.line_0: This is one of my favorites!
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_loved.3.line_0: What a sweet gift, thank you @i.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_loved.4.line_0: This makes me feel very welcome here.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_loved.5.line_0: How'd you know I love these?
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_liked.0.line_0: Thank you, I really appreciate it.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_liked.1.line_0: I know the perfect spot for this!
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_liked.2.line_0: I was looking for this at the market the other day! How'd you know?
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_liked.4.line_0: Is this from your farm? This is lovely.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_liked.5.line_0: This is a very considerate gift.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_liked.8.line_0: It's so nice to have people like you here.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_neutral.2.line_: I think one of my friends would like this!
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_neutral.4.line_: Is this from your farm? I've never seen one quite like this.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_disliked.0.line: Oh! I wasn't expecting something like this.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_disliked.1.line: You must know animals way better than people...
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_disliked.2.line: Sometimes it's better to not give gifts.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_disliked.6.line: Did you mean to give this to someone else?
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_disliked.7.line: We don't really have to give gifts to eachother...
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_hated.3.line_0: You can just ask me to leave directly.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_hated.5.line_0: This doesn't make me feel good...
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_hated.6.line_0: I'm not sure I want this...
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_hated.7.line_0: Can you leave me alone please.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_hated.8.line_0: I don't like these kinds of jokes.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_hated.9.line_0: Sorry but I really don't want this...
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_hated.10.line_0: This might be the worst thing I've ever been given...
dialog.npc.witch.name: Eliza
dialog.npc.witch.intro.0.line_0: Hey stranger, my name is Danny. I'm here to help you build the village you're starting in Sunlit Valley.
dialog.npc.witch.intro.0.line_1: If you're looking to invite more villagers, come talk to me and I can help you build homes for them.
dialog.npc.witch.intro.0.line_2: If you'd prefer to do the building yourself, just let me know and I can give you the invitations and sell any building supplies you'll need.
dialog.npc.witch.intro.0.line_3: That's all I have for now, you really have your work cut out for you here. Come see me if you need anything!
dialog.npc.witch.gift_liked.0.line_0: I love a little treat like this
dialog.npc.witch.gift_disliked.1.line_0: Why did you think I would like this?
